name: Horse, Riding
description: A Riding Horse is a large beast with moderate durability and a considerable speed of 60 feet per round, primarily valued for its role as a mount for adventurers.
memorable: Known for its ability to grant advantage on saving throws against exhaustion for riders during long travels.
goals: To serve as a reliable mount for travelers and adventurers.
relations: Often found with adventurers, serving as mounts.
environment: Commonly found in stables or used in the field by travelers.
strengths: High speed and the ability to support riders during long journeys.
weaknesses: Average defenses with an Armor Class of 10, making it vulnerable in combat.
attacks: Can perform a melee attack with its hooves, dealing 6 bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Easy Gait, which helps riders resist exhaustion from long marches.
additional_information: Has a Strength score of +3, enabling good physical tasks.
Intelligence is -4, indicating a lack of understanding complex commands.
Provides support in navigating and traveling quickly across terrains.
test_queries: large beast that helps with travel
horse with advantage on exhaustion saves
